com.github.uberroot.ncjbot.ConfigManager.EventListener

  • Packages that use ConfigManager.EventListener 
    Package Description
    com.github.uberroot.ncjbot
    This package contains the classes that form the core of NCJBot.

      A list of listeners that receive all updates.

      A mapping of sections to individual key listeners.
      private java.util.Hashtable<java.lang.String,java.util.Vector<ConfigManager.EventListener>> ConfigManager.sectionListeners

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Adds a listener set to receive configuration updates from a key in a section.

      Adds a listener to receive all configuration updates.
      void ConfigManager.addSectionListener(java.lang.String section, ConfigManager.EventListener listener)
      Adds a listener to receive all configuration updates on a section.

      Removes a listener set to receive all configuration updates.
      void ConfigManager.removeSectionListener(java.lang.String section, ConfigManager.EventListener listener)
